Ancestry-Elf -- Male Woodland Elf Fighter
Strength: 14 (+2) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 8 (-1) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 12 (+1)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 0/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 35 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 7/12
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Fast: +5 Speed
Nimble Elf: +5 Speed
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 1; General: 0 Selectable Feature Count: Elf (Heritage); Fighter (Key Ability)
Feats: Ageless Patience; Ancestral Longevity; Elf Step; Elven Lore; Elven Weapon Elegance; Elven Weapon Expertise; Elven Weapon Familiarity; Expert Longevity; Forlorn; Nimble Elf; Otherworldly Magic; Point-Blank Shot; Universal Longevity; Unwavering Mien Fighter Features: Ability Boost (Dexterity); Ability Boosts; Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Of Opportunity; Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Class Trained (Fighter); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Dexterity; Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Ability; Fighter Skills; Perception Expert; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Elf Features: Ability Boost (Dexterity; Intelligence; Choose 1 from any); Ability Flaw (Constitution); Ancestry Feats; Arctic Elf; Cavern Elf; Elf Heritage; Fast; Low-Light Vision; Seer Elf; Whisper Elf; Woodland Elf
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
Cavern Elf: Has the Darkvision feature
Elf Heritage: 1 selection
Fighter Feats: 1 selections
Fighter Key Ability: 1 selection
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +6 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +7 (dexterity; trained) Elven Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Scouting Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +5 (intelligence; trained) Fortune-Telling Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +2 (strength; untrained) Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Cavern Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Circus Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +4 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +1 (wisdom; untrained)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Occultism: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +7 (dexterity; trained)
Deception: +1 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +1 (charisma; untrained)
Diplomacy: +1 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Languages: Aquan; Common; Elven; Halfling
Skill Notes:
Elven Lore: Skill Trained (Arcana; Nature; Elven Lore)
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 5 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Ageless Patience: May spend double the time normally required on a check to gain a +2 bonus and suffer a critical failure only on a roll of 10 lower than the DC
Ancestral Longevity: Gains Trained proficiency in choice of skill during daily prep
Expert Longevity: Gains expert level in a chosen trained skill during daily prep and may replace an existing skill increase with the one chosen upon expiration
Seer Elf: +1 to Identify Magic and Decipher Writing of a magical nature
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Universal Longevity: (1) Can replace Ancestral Longevity and Expert Longevity skills once per day
Whisper Elf: Can Seek in a 60' cone using hearing and gains +2 within 30'
Woodland Elf: Can Climb foliage at 17', or 35' on a critical success
Combat
Hit Points: 15 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (2 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: None Weapons: Crossbow (+9 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Katana (+7 1d6+2 S/P [2h d10; Crit +d8]; strength; expert); Rapier (+9 1d6+2 P [Crit +d8]; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: -1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Elven Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Longbow; Composite Longbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortbow; Composite Shortbow; Elf Weapons)
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Longbow; Composite Longbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortbow; Composite Shortbow)/Treats elf weapons as one category simpler
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Elf Step: (1) Steps twice in 1 action
Elven Weapon Elegance: Critical hits with a longbow, composite longbow, longsword, rapier, shortbow, composite shortbow, or elf weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon elf weapons
Point-Blank Shot: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Woodland Elf: Can always Take Cover within forest terrain
Save: Fortitude: +4 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Arctic Elf: Has cold resistance 1 and treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Forlorn: +1 vs. emotion effects, and successes are critical successes
Unwavering Mien: Reduces the duration of mental effects lasting at least 2 rd by 1 rd/Saves vs. sleep effects gain +1 degree of success
Magic
Attack: Arcane Innate: +4 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 14 (charisma; trained)
Spells: Detect Magic (A0 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Magic Notes:
Seer Elf: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate cantrip
Otherworldly Magic: Can cast a chosen arcane cantrip as an innate spell at will
Notes
Validation Errors:
Ageless Patience Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Ancestry Feats Allocation: 1 available vs. 13 allocated
Elf Heritage Allocation: 1 available vs. 5 allocated
Elf Step Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
Elven Weapon Elegance Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5 and elven weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
Elven Weapon Expertise Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and elven weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
Expert Longevity Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and ancestral longevity feature (currently 1)
Universal Longevity Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and expert longevity feature (currently 1)
